data.title: Shalini Gakhar on LinkedIn: An incredible experience for two months, online course on Digital…
data.meta_description: An incredible experience for two months, online course on Digital Agriculture made us cognitive about the inclining interest towards this domain. Participants…
data.text:
The September edition of the Agribusiness News! newsletter is now available. If you are interested in learning more about the Doane University Agribusiness Program, alumni, students, and activities, among many other great articles, take a look and please let me know if you would like to receive this monthly newsletter. It is always fun for me to put this together as a great reminder of the wonderful happenings in #agricultureeducation at Doane University. #doaneagribusiness #agricultureeducation #agriculture #farmersandranchers #education #agribusinessnews!

Our recent publication titled "Agricultural Markets, Cropping Patterns, and Consumption Patterns: The Moderating Effect of COVID-19 on Mountainous Communities" is now online. Taking influence from an exhaustive literature review, this study proposes and tests a model for the transformations observed in the agriculture markets, particularly input, labor, and product markets, and elucidates the influence of these changes on cropping and consumption patterns. With data from two major mountainous terrains in north Pakistan spanning three years before and during the pandemic, a quantitative inquiry was carried out on the agriculture markets and farming patterns. https://lnkd.in/db6MZKhs

Missed NZTE’s Global Agritech webinar? Here’s your chance to get the key learnings and download the full research report. Thanks to everyone who made it along to our recent Global Agritech webinar. We joined the experts to get an insight into today’s global agricultural landscape, and what producers and farmers are struggling with in 3 of New Zealand’s key export markets (Chile, California and Germany). More importantly, we explored the opportunities that exist for Kiwi agritech businesses in these markets, and how we can position our solutions for success. If you missed it, or you want to find out more, read the key takeaways and download the full report here: https://bit.ly/464hguD

📚 #NEWPUBLICATIONS 𝗔𝘀𝗶𝗮𝗻 𝗝𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗼𝗳 𝗔𝗴𝗿𝗶𝗰𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 (𝗔𝗝𝗔𝗗) 𝟐𝟭.𝟭 is now AVAILABLE! 📌Download AJAD 21.1 here: https://lnkd.in/gFG_k7r8 New research articles published in the June 2024 issue of the Asian Journal of Agriculture and Development (AJAD) take a peek at initiatives and the grassroots in Southeast Asia as they respond to previous food and economic shocks and their aftermath. The common themes of the seven papers in the AJAD volume 21.1 release hover around ensuring food security, future-proofing farming, creating resilient food value chains, good agricultural practices adoption, agrifood digitalization, withstanding food disruptions, building food-resilient households and communities, and sustainability of rural development. 📌 Read the news release here: https://lnkd.in/g9faJ5zB 📌To subscribe to the AJAD newsletter, visit: https://lnkd.in/gsKtVwcg ------ AJAD, an international refereed journal, provides information and analysis on topics within the broad scope of agriculture and development. It publishes articles resulting from empirical, policy-oriented, or institutional development studies, as well as articles of perspectives on agriculture and development; political economy of rural development; and trade issues. #SEARCAPublications #SEARCANews #SEARCAATTAIN

🌾 Exciting News 🌾 📢 After a brief pause, we're excited to announce the return of our Agri Report! Dive into Agri Report #25 for the latest and comprehensive updates on Georgia's agriculture sector. 📘 What will you find In the Report? 🟢 European Market Integration: Updates on Georgian fishery products gaining entry to the EU market. 🟢 Rural Development Initiatives: Details on the Preferential Agrocredit Project and ENPARD program enhancing rural livelihoods. 🟢 Agricultural Trends and Prices: Insightful data on current market prices for grains, livestock, and other commodities. 🟢 Global Exposure: Coverage of Georgian wine companies making their mark internationally through prestigious exhibitions. 🔗 Download Now: https://lnkd.in/dXXTT937 Get your copy today and immerse yourself in the detailed insights that shape our agricultural landscape. 🔄 Stay Updated: Follow us for a biweekly report filled with the latest news and trends from the agricultural world. 👀 Why Follow Us? Join us to receive consistent, valuable insights. Our reports offer a deep dive into agricultural developments, helping you stay ahead in the industry. 🌱 We're Back and Committed: After our short hiatus, we're back to continue our tradition of delivering high-quality, detailed agricultural reports. Be part of our community that's dedicated to growth and innovation in agriculture. 📆 Mark Your Calendars! We'll keep bringing you fresh insights every two weeks. #Agriculture #georgiaagriculture #agrireport #SustainableFarming #RuralDevelopment #MarketTrends

Running an agricultural business in Nigeria can be a bit challenging though the sector is a goldmine waiting to be unveiled. However, a few helpful tips from experts in the field can go a great way in helping to navigate through those challenges. Join us for Ask Me Anything Agriculture and all your questions on running an agricultural business will be answered. You need to attend the webinar if: a) You are running an agribusiness in Nigeria or want to start up one. b) You are curious about the agricultural sector and want to gain relevant knowledge in that path. c) You want to expand your agribusiness to Nigeria. d) You are a thought leader in the sector and would want to know how to partner with Kitovu Technology Company to solve the problem of food insecurity in Nigeria. Feel free to join us today at 5 pm WAT for this episode of the program. Kindly register for the event via the following link: https://lght.ly/8b5of95 Join the event directly via this link: https://lnkd.in/dV8q7Xgq
